Replies.Reply: OPENING CREDITS BEGIN.
HOLD.
Tick, tock, seven o'clock.  Time to rise and open your eyes.
Tick, tock, seven-oh-one.  Time to get up, the day had begun.
Tick, tock --
It's now eight.  You'll be late!
I dreamed about Mars again... it was bizarre, yet is was so real...
People do go to Mars, you know.
You know -- let's really do it.
No.  Go to Mars.
We can pool our savings and I've got some sick leave coming, besides my regular vacation...
That's just media talk.  They're...
...just a minority.  They're powerless.
I'll be late!
I keep forgetting, Herb.  They frighten me.
Okay.  Herb, okay.
But... is the process really that effective?  A false memory!?
Is it in any way dangerous?
It's just - incredible.
But... I'll know I hired you.
I won't?
"Intelligence Agent"... wouldn't that be dangerous?  I might attack....
No.  No.  You're a retired agent.  Mars was your last mission and you're never to break your cover.  But you'll have got the girl, killed the baddies, and saved the Universe.  Not bad, eh?
I don't know... about the whole thing... it's all such a fake.  I won't really have gone.  I won't really....

Let's face it, Douglas, you, and millions of people like you have no chance of ever getting to Mars and you'd never qualify as a secret agent for EIO.  This - REKALL - is the only way to achieve your dream.
You know that's illegal.
This really going to work?
Well... I'd like to see the Martian Sphinx...
One hundred... ninety-nine...
...Sophie....
Yes.
All of you in this room are dead.
What's he talking about?
You've broken my cover.

My name isn't Quail.

Killing you... killing you...
Where am I?
Where am I going?
How did I get here?
How did I get into this cab?
Mr. Zimmer...Mr. Zimmer...
Where are you taking me?
But I didn't... Are you telling me... I did go to Mars?  I don't remember?
Sphinx?... No, no, I don't, I... What about the people at Rekall?  I don't recall Rekall but you said if they know what I did?  Why don't you ask them?  They'll tell you I didn't...
What do you mean?
What are you going to do with me?
My God!  No!  You're going to kill me!
No!  It's not my fault!  You can't do it!
Wait a minute, I remember --
On Mars... they tried to kill me... And....
Did you know I've been to Mars?
I think I've been.  I vaguely recall...
Forget?  Remembering is the problem I must've been to one of those artificial memory places...
But something went wrong...
No.  That's what's so amazing.
I'm involved somehow with E.I.O.  It's true.  It's no fantasy.
For fuck's sake, this is no breakdown!
My God!  Did you say I need a psychiatrist?
How could you do it?  After eight years!
Not my wife!  You are out of your mind.
Why are you lying like this?
But why all of this?
But I remember it!  All of it!... Us!
Our friends... my work...
This is crazy!  If all my memories are false, who am I?  What am I?  Jesus... it's like I don't exist.
Why did you try to kill me?
Well, what did I do on Mars that they have to keep me from telling?
All right... I'm leaving.
No wonder you got the role as my bitchy wife -- type casting.
A room for the night.
Here's ten thousand.  Forget the ID.
I have a liaison with a lady... and I'm married...
I told you, I don't want to be disturbed.
Who are you?  What the hell is this?
Why should I trust you?
Keep talking.
What do I want with Grecian candlesticks!
How did you know where to find me?
You're E.I.O.  You're on the other team.
I can't remember - only bits...
I'm Hotchkiss...I came for the...Grecian candlesticks...

Martian money....

It's no Garden of Eden.

Right.

Well, uh... I...

I don't have a wife.  Well, I do - but not a real wife.

Something happened to my mind.

I need your help --

Cohaagen?  But isn't he often here?

I'm listening.

Why did you kill him?  It was the next bit I really...
Stands.  For a moment his back is to Melina and Bennie.
I'm fine... only I'm not Doug -- I'm Charles Hauser...
Bennie, where's your depot?
Can you get us there?
We're going to the Sphinx.
Only everything.  I've got total recall.

This is what we need.
Come on, Bennie, move it.
Have you heard the word, "terriform"?
The machine in the Sphinx is tapped straight down to the molten core of this planet.
To combine elements in the Martian core and release them as oxygen, hydrogen and nitrogen.
That's right.  Air and water.
Don't you see?!  From being a pile of red dirt with minerals, Mars is going to change into  a chunk of priceless real estate.
Right!  He can start selling it off to well-heeled investors from Earth.  Beach condos, ski resorts, you name it.
Once word of this gets out, the whole planet will support you.
Ruin his little scheme by terriforming ahead of schedule - while the inhabitants are still here.
I'm the only one who does.

Bennie, don't stop now, take it...
I should have known, you were just too helpful.

This is the main tap --

Catch!

Yes...

Wrong, Cohaagen, there's a long tunnel, a brilliant white light, hands reaching for me...

What do they expect ... the way men dress these days ...
Rape men in the park?
Go to hell.
...more of a half-wit.  For a start a war could break out there any day ...

Oh my God...

I haven't seen you move that fast since I've known you.
I'm not your wife, Quail.

We had to watchdog you...make sure the erasure took.  A wife seemed like a good idea.
All implanted.

You exist, all right.
That's the problem.

I've no idea.  I just work here.
I don't have to follow you.
No weapon again, Mr. Quail?

Get out!

So why is Cohaagen shipping everyone out?

Charles - for Mars's sake....

Replies.Reply: It's happening.
Mr. Hauser...
Mr. Hauser, I want to talk to you... about Douglas Quail.
My name is George Edgemar.
Yes.  It's difficult to explain... Could you open the door, please?  I'm not armed.
You've had it, Hauser!  Throw out your weapon if you want a past!
What do you say, Hauser?  We haven't got all night!  Hauser?
We'll put in a word with the big boys.  Maybe you'll just get exile to Venus.
Hello, Mr. Quail.  May I come in?  I won't be offended if you prefer to keep the gun you're holding trained on me.
My card, Mr. Quail.
As I said... this is going to be very difficult -- for both of us.
Mr. Quail... I'm afraid you're not really standing here at this moment.
I said, you're not really here.  Neither am I.  We're both in the Memory Studio --
No, not quite.  We didn't give you this.  You're creating it yourself --
Remember the option we offered you?  Intelligence agent?
This is not -- shit, Mr. Quail.
I've been artificially implanted -- like the first part of your fantasy.  I'm actually monitoring your dream at a psychoprobe console.
I was afraid you'd think that.
Just do exactly as we tell you.
If we can't get you out now...
But there will by consequences inside your mind.  Consequences that won't hurt me... but could be fatal to you.
If you shoot me, you'll wipe me out of your fantasy -- I can't come back again.  Because to you, I'll be dead.  I can't help you get back to reality.
You're going to lower the gun, Mr. Quail.  You're going to hand it to me --
You're going to do exactly what I tell you --
Wouldn't you prefer your order in your room, sir?
But, sir...
Yes, sir.  In a couple of hours it'll be all gone.
Not much, sir.  A lot of complaining.  But they're all heading towards the shuttle areas.

...then he can call all the shots.
And if that doesn't work?
What if that doesn't work?
Your servant, Fahreem Kuato.

Tolerate my presumption, but it does not tax my powers to know that you are the most sought-after man on two worlds.

-- and very little time.

Indubitably.  There is only small matter of a fee.
Income before ideals.  Shall we say five-hundred-thousand dollars?
Not Martian dollars, Mr.

Yes... I can feel it... a wall.  Erasure techniques are so brutal.
Naturally.
Do not fear me.  I need your openness...
Open you thoughts to my presence...
Open...
-- the vengence you seek...
